name: Porsche
description: Porsche is a luxury and high-performance automobile manufacturer specializing in sports cars, SUVs, and sedans. Known for iconic models like the 911, Cayenne, and Taycan (their first all-electric car), Porsche combines engineering excellence with premium design. The brand is also famous for its motorsport heritage, particularly in endurance racing like the 24 Hours of Le

name: Toyota
description: Toyota is one of the worldâ€™s largest automakers, known for its reliability, affordability, and innovation in hybrid technology. Iconic models include the Corolla, Camry, and Prius.

name: Ford
description: Ford Motor Company revolutionized the automobile industry with mass production. Known for the Mustang, F-150, and Explorer, it continues to be a leader in innovation and performance.

name: BMW
description: BMW (Bayerische Motoren Werke) is a German premium car and motorcycle manufacturer, renowned for sporty driving dynamics and luxury. Notable models include the 3 Series, 7 Series, and X5.

name: Hyundai
description: Hyundai is a leading South Korean automotive brand known for value, design, and technology. It offers models like the Creta, Verna, and Ioniq EV lineup.
